titleStmt.title: A confutation of a booke intituled An apologie of the Church of England, by Thomas Harding Doctor of Diuinitie
titleStmt.author: Harding, Thomas, 1516-1572.

notesStmt.note: A reply to: Jewel, John. Apologia Ecclesiae Anglicanae.
Includes index and a final errata leaf.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures: *⁶ !⁶ A-3Z⁴ a-x⁴.
